word: The question asked by him was wise and would have commended itself to those presiding at the council had they not been deceived by the enemy. But they were so filled with prejudice that no argument in favor of Jesus of Nazareth, however convincing, had any weight with them. The answer that Nicodemus received was \93Art thou also of Galilee? Search, and look; for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet.\94
